description: Marks an actor who is actively restraining another entity, limiting the target's movement and signaling conflicting proximity actions are unavailable.

restrained_entity_id.description: The ID of the entity currently being restrained by this actor

initiated.description: Whether this entity initiated the restraining interaction

consented.description: Whether the restrained entity has consented to the restraint

activityMetadata.description: Inline metadata for activity description generation. Allows this component to define how it should be described in activity summaries without requiring a separate metadata component.

shouldDescribeInActivity.description: Whether this component should be included in activity descriptions. Set to false to hide from activity summaries.

template.description: Template string with placeholders: {actor} for the entity with this component, {target} for the entity referenced by targetRole property

targetRole.description: Property name in this component's data containing the target entity ID. Defaults to 'restrained_entity_id' for the entity being restrained.

priority.description: Display priority for activity ordering. Higher values appear first. Range: 0-100. Slightly higher than being_restrained to emphasize the actor's restraining action.
